sentence.Network_en: I 5 eIFn ; 9 midI ` eFEn / n [ U ]: All offers of mediation were rejected.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有调解的建议均遭拒绝.

sentence.Network_en: Spain was invaded in 710 and the Pyrenees mountains were reached in 720.
sentence.Network_cn: 710年,西班牙遭到侵略;720年,烽火烧到了比利牛斯山脉.

sentence.Network_en: MIDI music creation, that is, to write these command signals.
sentence.Network_cn: MIDI音乐的创作, 即是这些指令性信号的书写.

auth_sentence.content: Schueller was the kid from the Rue du Cherche-Midi.
auth_sentence.res_content: Schueller was the kid from the Rue du Cherche-Midi.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Schueller was the kid from the Rue du Cherche-Midi.

auth_sentence.content: The French assembled an army along the Pyrenees.
auth_sentence.res_content: The French assembled an army along the Pyrenees.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The French assembled an army along the Pyrenees.

auth_sentence.content: Somewhere below the Pic du Midi de Bigorre we ascended into thick cloud.
auth_sentence.res_content: Somewhere below the Pic du Midi de Bigorre we ascended into thick cloud.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Somewhere below the Pic du Midi de Bigorre we ascended into thick cloud.
